The goal of a kernel regression is to discover the","non-linear relationship between two random variables. To discover the","non-linear relationship, kernel estimator or kernel smoothing is the","main method to estimate the curve for non-parametric statistics. In","kernel estimator, weight function is known as kernel function","[@efr2008]. Cite this paper [@bro2014principal]. The GEE [@wang2014].","","## Methods","","The common non-parametric regression model is","$Y_i = m(X_i) + \\varepsilon_i$, where $Y_i$ can be defined as the sum of","the regression function value $m(x)$ for $X_i$. Here $m(x)$ is unknown","and $\\varepsilon_i$ some errors. With the help of this definition, we","can create the estimation for local averaging i.e. $m(x)$ can be","estimated with the product of $Y_i$ average and $X_i$ is near to $x$. In","other words, this means that we are discovering the line through the","data points with the help of surrounding data points. The estimation","formula is printed below [@R-base]:","","$$","M_n(x) = \\sum_{i=1}^{n} W_n (X_i) Y_i  \\tag{1}","$$ $W_n(x)$ is the sum of weights that belongs to all real numbers.","Weights are positive numbers and small if $X_i$ is far from $x$.","","## Analysis and Results","","### Data and Vizualisation","","A study was conducted to determine how...","","```{r, warning=FALSE, echo=T,
